card_text: 2 Level 4 monsters$NYou can detach 1 material from this card; if you have more cards in your Extra Deck than your opponent's, apply these effects in sequence, depending on the difference.$N●1+: This card gains 1000 ATK until the end of your opponent's turn.$N●5+: Neither player can target this card with card effects until the end of your opponent's turn.$N●10+: Banish 1 card your opponent controls.$N●15+: Make your opponent's LP 3000.$NYou can only use this effect of "Pendransaction" once per turn.
